explain.statement: SELECT true AS present, p.cost IS NOT MISSING AS cost, p.cardinality IS NOT MISSING AS cardinality FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'HashJoin' AND v.build_aliases[0] = 'c' AND v.`outer` IS MISSING END

statements: SELECT c.customerId, p.purchaseId, pd.productId FROM customer c LEFT JOIN purchase p USE HASH(probe) ON c.customerId = p.customerId UNNEST p.lineItems as l JOIN product pd ON l.product = pd.productId WHERE c.lastName IN [ "Gibson", "Quitzon" ] ORDER BY c.customerId, p.purchaseId, pd.productId LIMIT 10

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present, p.cost IS NOT MISSING AS cost, p.cardinality IS NOT MISSING AS cardinality, p.`optimizer_hints` FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'HashJoin' AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`build_aliases`) = 1 END AND ANY u WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES u.`#operator` = 'HashJoin' AND u.`outer` = true AND u.`build_aliases`[0] = 'r' END

statements: SELECT l1.c11, l2.c12, r.c22 FROM shellTest l1 LEFT JOIN shellTest r USE HASH(build) ON l1.c11 = r.c21 AND r.type = "right" JOIN shellTest l2 USE HASH(probe) ON l1.c11 = l2.c11 AND l2.type = "left" WHERE l1.type = "left" ORDER BY l1.c11, r.c22

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present, p.cost IS NOT MISSING AS cost, p.cardinality IS NOT MISSING AS cardinality, p.`optimizer_hints` FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'HashJoin' AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`build_aliases`) = 3 END AND ANY u WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES u.`#operator` = 'Unnest' AND u.`as` = 'l' AND ARRAY_LENGTH(u.`build_bit_filters`) > 0 END AND ANY w WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES w.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND w.`as` = 'pd' AND ARRAY_LENGTH(w.`probe_bit_filters`) > 0 END

statements: SELECT /*+ JOIN_FILTER(pd) */ pc.purchaseId, l.product, pd.name, c.lastName, c.firstName FROM purchase pc JOIN customer c ON pc.customerId = c.customerId UNNEST pc.lineItems as l JOIN product pd USE HASH(probe) ON l.product = pd.productId WHERE pc.purchaseId = "purchase6558" ORDER BY l.product

results.name: Hunter 26406 Architect Series Plus 52-Inch 5-Blade3-Light Ceiling Fan, Brushed Nickel with Chestnut/Maple Blades and Frosted Scalloped Glass Shades
Boon Glo Nightlight with Portable Balls, White
Diamondback 2013 Cobra Junior Mountain Bike with 24-Inch Wheels  (Red, 24-Inch/Boys)

explain.statement: SELECT true AS present, p.cost IS NOT MISSING AS cost, p.cardinality IS NOT MISSING AS cardinality, p.`optimizer_hints` FROM $explan AS p WHERE ANY v WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES v.`#operator` = 'HashJoin' AND ARRAY_LENGTH(v.`build_aliases`) = 3 END AND ANY u WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES u.`#operator` = 'Unnest' AND u.`as` = 'l' AND ARRAY_LENGTH(u.`build_bit_filters`) > 0 END AND ANY w WITHIN p.plan.`~children` SATISFIES w.`#operator` LIKE 'IndexScan%' AND w.`as` = 'pd' AND ARRAY_LENGTH(w.`probe_bit_filters`) > 0 END

statements: SELECT /*+ JOIN_FILTER(pd) */ pc.purchaseId, l.product, pd.name, c.lastName, c.firstName FROM purchase pc JOIN customer c USE HASH(build) ON pc.customerId = c.customerId UNNEST pc.lineItems as l JOIN product pd USE HASH(probe) ON l.product = pd.productId WHERE pc.purchaseId = "purchase6558" ORDER BY l.product
